mapper.insert: insert into beacon (BEACON_MJR, BEACON_MNR, BEACON_STTUS, BHF_CODE) values (#{beacon_mjr}, #{beacon_mnr}, #{beacon_sttus}, #{bhf_code})
mapper.select: select beacon_code, beacon_mjr, beacon_mnr, beacon_sttus from beacon where BHF_CODE = #{bhf_code} and beacon_sttus = 'ON'
select beacon_mjr, beacon_mnr, beacon_sttus from beacon where BHF_CODE = #{bhf_code}
